item.title: Company
item.description: We are moneo We build ambitious products that engage your users and help you to achieve your business objectives. Our Story Nearly a decade ago, we came up with an idea of setting up a great team with a goal of building awesome digital products for startups and companies. Like every other company out there, we started as a small business but dedicated ourselves to product details, as well as the happiness of individuals; we maintained them chemistry and thus get bigger.

item.title: Smart Bundling: How To Serve Legacy Code Only To Legacy Browsers
item.description: While effective bundling of resources on the web has received a great deal of mindshare in recent times, how we ship front-end resources to our users has remained pretty much the same. The average weight of JavaScript and style resources that a website ships with is rising — even though build tooling to optimize the website has never been better. With the marketshare of evergreen browsers rising fast and browsers launching support for new features in lockstep, is it time we rethink asset delivery for the modern web?
